## **What Are Gun Buyback Programs?**

Gun buyback programs are public initiatives in which governments or non-profit organizations offer financial compensation to individuals who voluntarily surrender firearms. These programs are typically anonymous and do not require proof of legal ownership. They may target specific types of firearms (e.g., assault weapons) or all types.
